posts.title: Grilled Salmon Spring Roll - Bento Menu
posts.excerpt: Ingredients ( 1 serve ) salmon 120 g salt 4 perilla leaves 1 plum 1 slice of cheddar cheese 2 spring roll wrapper oil 2 tsp Instructions Cut the salmon in half, sprinkle with salt and marinate for 5 minutes. The plums went to the nucleus and were sliced ​​into a sauce with a knife. The cheese is cut in half. Put 2 pieces of perilla leaves, 1/2 pieces of salmon, 1/2 pieces of cheese, and plums on a piece of spring roll and roll it up. The rolled tail is placed down. Make 2 pieces. Place 2 on the tin foil and pour the salad oil from above. The tin foil is opened and baked on a grilled fish rack for 6 minutes on a small fire. Cut in half after heating. Learn How to Cook At lalawe.com
